price: 23. Mpe topesaki Mûssa buku, mpe kozala na tembe te тропа bokutani na ye,(1) mpe totiyaki ye azala mokambi ya bana ya isalayele.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
footnotes: 1 Ye: Yo Muhammad kozala na tembe te тропа bokutani nayo na Mûssa o eleko ya mobembo nayo ya butu.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba falā takun fī mir'yatin min liqāihi wajaʿalnāhu hudan libanī is'rāīla
